name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.fiberToSpecResidueField_apply
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : X.Hom Y
y : ↑↑Y.toPresheafedSpace
x : ↑↑(f.fiber y).toPresheafedSpace
⊢ Eq ((f.fiberToSpecResidueField y).base x) (IsLocalRing.closedPoint ↑(Y.residueField y))
decl:
lemma Scheme.Hom.fiberToSpecResidueField_apply (f : X.Hom Y) (y : Y) (x : f.fiber y) :
    (f.fiberToSpecResidueField y).base x = IsLocalRing.closedPoint (Y.residueField y) :=
  Subsingleton.elim (α := PrimeSpectrum _) _ _

name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.range_fiberι
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : X.Hom Y
y : ↑↑Y.toPresheafedSpace
⊢ Eq (Set.range ⇑(f.fiberι y).base) (Set.preimage (⇑f.base) (Singleton.singleton y))
decl:
lemma Scheme.Hom.range_fiberι (f : X.Hom Y) (y : Y) :
    Set.range (f.fiberι y).base = f.base ⁻¹' {y} := by
  simp [fiber, fiberι, Scheme.Pullback.range_fst, Scheme.range_fromSpecResidueField]

name: AlgebraicGeometry.instIsPreimmersionFiberι
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
y : ↑↑Y.toPresheafedSpace
⊢ AlgebraicGeometry.IsPreimmersion (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.fiberι f y)
decl:
instance (f : X ⟶ Y) (y : Y) : IsPreimmersion (f.fiberι y) :=
  MorphismProperty.pullback_fst _ _ inferInstance

name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.fiberHomeo_apply
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : X.Hom Y
y : ↑↑Y.toPresheafedSpace
x : ↑↑(f.fiber y).toPresheafedSpace
⊢ Eq (↑((f.fiberHomeo y) x)) ((f.fiberι y).base x)
decl:
@[simp]
lemma Scheme.Hom.fiberHomeo_apply (f : X.Hom Y) (y : Y) (x : f.fiber y) :
    (f.fiberHomeo y x).1 = (f.fiberι y).base x := rfl

name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.fiberι_fiberHomeo_symm
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : X.Hom Y
y : ↑↑Y.toPresheafedSpace
x : ↑(Set.preimage (⇑f.base) (Singleton.singleton y))
⊢ Eq ((f.fiberι y).base ((f.fiberHomeo y).symm x)) ↑x
decl:
@[simp]
lemma Scheme.Hom.fiberι_fiberHomeo_symm (f : X.Hom Y) (y : Y) (x : f.base ⁻¹' {y}) :
    (f.fiberι y).base ((f.fiberHomeo y).symm x) = x :=
  congr($((f.fiberHomeo y).apply_symm_apply x).1)

name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.fiberι_asFiber
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : X.Hom Y
x : ↑↑X.toPresheafedSpace
⊢ Eq ((f.fiberι (f.base x)).base (f.asFiber x)) x
decl:
@[simp]
lemma Scheme.Hom.fiberι_asFiber (f : X.Hom Y) (x : X) : (f.fiberι _).base (f.asFiber x) = x :=
  f.fiberι_fiberHomeo_symm _ _

name: AlgebraicGeometry.instCompactSpaceαTopologicalSpaceCarrierCommRingCatFiberOfQuasiCompact
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
inst✝ : AlgebraicGeometry.QuasiCompact f
y : ↑↑Y.toPresheafedSpace
⊢ CompactSpace ↑↑(AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.fiber f y).toPresheafedSpace
decl:
instance (f : X ⟶ Y) [QuasiCompact f] (y : Y) : CompactSpace (f.fiber y) :=
  haveI : QuasiCompact (f.fiberToSpecResidueField y) :=
      MorphismProperty.pullback_snd _ _ inferInstance
  HasAffineProperty.iff_of_isAffine (P := @QuasiCompact)
    (f := f.fiberToSpecResidueField y).mp inferInstance

name: AlgebraicGeometry.QuasiCompact.isCompact_preimage_singleton
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
inst✝ : AlgebraicGeometry.QuasiCompact f
y : ↑↑Y.toPresheafedSpace
⊢ IsCompact (Set.preimage (⇑f.base) (Singleton.singleton y))
decl:
lemma QuasiCompact.isCompact_preimage_singleton (f : X ⟶ Y) [QuasiCompact f] (y : Y) :
    IsCompact (f.base ⁻¹' {y}) :=
  f.range_fiberι y ▸ isCompact_range (f.fiberι y).continuous

name: AlgebraicGeometry.instIsAffineFiberOfIsAffineHom
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
inst✝ : AlgebraicGeometry.IsAffineHom f
y : ↑↑Y.toPresheafedSpace
⊢ AlgebraicGeometry.IsAffine (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.fiber f y)
decl:
instance (f : X ⟶ Y) [IsAffineHom f] (y : Y) : IsAffine (f.fiber y) :=
  haveI : IsAffineHom (f.fiberToSpecResidueField y) :=
    MorphismProperty.pullback_snd _ _ inferInstance
  isAffine_of_isAffineHom (f.fiberToSpecResidueField y)

name: AlgebraicGeometry.instJacobsonSpaceαTopologicalSpaceCarrierCommRingCatFiberOfLocallyOfFiniteType
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
y : ↑↑Y.toPresheafedSpace
inst✝ : AlgebraicGeometry.LocallyOfFiniteType f
⊢ JacobsonSpace ↑↑(AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.fiber f y).toPresheafedSpace
decl:
instance (f : X ⟶ Y) (y : Y) [LocallyOfFiniteType f] : JacobsonSpace (f.fiber y) :=
  have : LocallyOfFiniteType (f.fiberToSpecResidueField y) :=
    MorphismProperty.pullback_snd _ _ inferInstance
  LocallyOfFiniteType.jacobsonSpace (f.fiberToSpecResidueField y)

name: AlgebraicGeometry.instFiniteαTopologicalSpaceCarrierCommRingCatFiberOfIsFinite
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
y : ↑↑Y.toPresheafedSpace
inst✝ : AlgebraicGeometry.IsFinite f
⊢ Finite ↑↑(AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.fiber f y).toPresheafedSpace
decl:
instance (f : X ⟶ Y) (y : Y) [IsFinite f] : Finite (f.fiber y) := by
  have H : IsFinite (f.fiberToSpecResidueField y) := MorphismProperty.pullback_snd _ _ inferInstance
  have : IsArtinianRing Γ(f.fiber y, ⊤) :=
    @IsArtinianRing.of_finite (Y.residueField y) Γ(f.fiber y, ⊤) _ _ (show _ from _) _
      ((HasAffineProperty.iff_of_isAffine.mp H).2.comp (.of_surjective _ (Scheme.ΓSpecIso
        (Y.residueField y)).commRingCatIsoToRingEquiv.symm.surjective))
  exact .of_injective (β := PrimeSpectrum _) _ (f.fiber y).isoSpec.hom.homeomorph.injective

name: AlgebraicGeometry.IsFinite.finite_preimage_singleton
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
inst✝ : AlgebraicGeometry.IsFinite f
y : ↑↑Y.toPresheafedSpace
⊢ (Set.preimage (⇑f.base) (Singleton.singleton y)).Finite
decl:
lemma IsFinite.finite_preimage_singleton (f : X ⟶ Y) [IsFinite f] (y : Y) :
    (f.base ⁻¹' {y}).Finite :=
  f.range_fiberι y ▸ Set.finite_range (f.fiberι y).base

name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.finite_preimage
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : X.Hom Y
inst✝ : AlgebraicGeometry.IsFinite f
s : Set ↑↑Y.toPresheafedSpace
hs : s.Finite
⊢ (Set.preimage (⇑f.base) s).Finite
decl:
lemma Scheme.Hom.finite_preimage (f : X.Hom Y) [IsFinite f] {s : Set Y} (hs : s.Finite) :
    (f.base ⁻¹' s).Finite := by
  rw [← Set.biUnion_of_singleton s, Set.preimage_iUnion₂]
  exact hs.biUnion fun _ _ ↦ IsFinite.finite_preimage_singleton f _

name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.discrete_fiber
initialProofState:
X Y : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
y : ↑↑Y.toPresheafedSpace
inst✝ : AlgebraicGeometry.IsFinite f
⊢ DiscreteTopology ↑↑(AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.fiber f y).toPresheafedSpace
decl:
instance Scheme.Hom.discrete_fiber (f : X ⟶ Y) (y : Y) [IsFinite f] :
    DiscreteTopology (f.fiber y) := inferInstance
